snippet: The announcement came a day after the company received an unsolicited $15-a-share buyout offer from its rival, j2 Global, that values it at about $404.5 million.
abstract: Carbonite data security and storage company names Mohamad S Ali as its new chief executive; announcement comes day after company received unsolicited $15-a-share buyout offer from rival j2 Global, valuing it at about $404.5 million.
lead_paragraph: The announcement came a day after the company received an unsolicited $15-a-share buyout offer from its rival, j2 Global, that values it at about $404.5 million.

headline.main: Just After Acquisition Interest, Carbonite Names New Chief
headline.print_headline: Just After Acquisition Interest, Carbonite Names New Chief
